text: I wrote yesterday that it may be time for a general strike to shut down the US economy for a few days to express our total rejection of the path our government is taking. A good day would be when Trump meets with Putin. Then I thought, why just the US. Let's have a worldwide economic shutdown. Let's show Trump Country how interdependent our economies are. Let's wake our fellow Americans up, deliver a message that routes around Fox News and the traitor occupying the White House.
